/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and buses navigating their way through the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the scene.
